data.title: Prayer List — Sycamore View Church
data.meta_site_name: Sycamore View Church | Church in Memphis, TN
data.text:
SYMPATHY IS EXTENDED TO:

Lesa Grinder White, Shane and Heath Grinder and Family, former members of SV, in the death of their brother and father, Greg Grinder, on Tuesday, July 16th. Visitation will begin at 10:00 am on Monday, July 29th, at Great Oaks Church of Christ, 3355 Brunswick Road, Memphis, TN 38133, and a memorial service will follow at 12:00 pm at the same location.

Maria Trailer and Family, in the death of her husband, Phillip Trailer, who was a first cousin of Terry Jones. The family lives in Opelika, Alabama, and Phillip died of pancreatic cancer 4 days after the doctors told the family he had 3 weeks to live. Prayers are requested for Maria, their sons, daughters-in-law, grandchildren, and Phillip’s mother and father. A memorial service was held Tuesday, July 16th, at First Baptist Church, Opelika, Alabama, followed by a graveside service at Garden Hill Cemetery.

Teresa Morris, in the sudden death of her sister, Robin Cooper, on July 8th. Prayers are requested for the family. Funeral services to honor and celebrate Robin's life were held on Friday, July 12th, in the chapel of Arrington Funeral Directors, 148 West University Pkwy, Jackson, TN 38305, with Rev. Jeremy Brown officiating. Burial was at Ridgecrest Cemetery.

PRAYERS REQUESTED:

Sheena Hilliard, online attendee, requests prayers as she is struggling in life to feel connected and also dealing with financial struggles; also requests prayers for blessings for her family.

Suzanne Jones, recovering from a hard fall last week in her work parking lot and had to wait for help in the heat as she was unable to get to vehicle; doctors determined injuries suffered on her right side, toes, knees, and chest muscles which are causing difficulty in breathing and movement; requests prayers for strength and complete healing as she recovers at home and is thankful there were no broken bones.

Ken Gurley, was discharged from rehab hospital on Tuesday; feeling much better following a filter being placed into a blood vessel in his abdomen several weeks ago; will continue to have therapy at home a few days a week for a while; requests continued prayers for his strength and complete healing.

Leslie Whiteside, requests prayers for her son and herself as she continues to deal with balance issues when walking; thankful to God that He knows our needs and promises to fulfill them if we will just ask Him.

Officer Bev., workplace friend of Suzanne Jones, requests prayers for strength and peace as her son has PEI and dealing with related issues involving his illness and her sister has cancer which appears to have spread over her entire body.

Les Taylor, former member of SV, was discharged July 14th from Methodist North Hospital following a hospital stay for AFib which doctors were able to regulate with medication; requests prayers for strength and complete healing.

Julia Linquist, neighbor of Melita Pitts, requests prayers as she continues to recover from a fall.

George Warbritton, husband of Carole Warbritton, requests continued prayers as he is now at home and continuing to recover from foot surgery; receiving physical therapy at home.

Pam Eaton, mother of Eddie Eaton, requests prayers for strength and complete healing as she has recently had surgery to remove a bowel obstruction, hernia, and also has a broken leg.

Iola Davis, requests prayers for strength, patience, and help as she takes care of her mother who has Alzheimer’s disease.
